data.text: Help the tightrope walker reach the other end of the rope. Type the correct answer in the given space. Click 'Submit'.
data.Question: In Pakistan, the __________ makes the rules for the country.
The police can __________ people who break the law.
People can go to a __________ for justice.
A __________ or a magistrate is a person in the court who sees to it that the guilty are punished.

Courts in districts that handle small matters
are called __________ courts.
The __________ Court is the highest court in Pakistan.
The people who bring a case to the court are part of the __________.
A lawyer who speaks for the accused person is called a __________ lawyer.
A __________ is a person who has seen a crime being committed.
When there is more than one judge in a case, then it is called a trial by __________.
data.feedback: Oh no! That's not correct. Try again.
